and.name: ChefsNotebook
and.description: ChefsNotebook is command line tool for managing recipes

feature.name: Database
feature.description: Recipes are stored in a SQLite database

feature.name: MarkdownFiles
feature.description: Recipes are stored as a directory of markdown files

and.name: RecipeData
and.description: Options for which data to assign to a recipe

alt.name: Ingredients
alt.description: Options for the format of ingredients

feature.name: Text
feature.description: Ingredients are formatted as a freeform text field

and.name: Structured
and.description: Ingredients are formatted in a structured way, e.g. as a List of Ingredients

feature.name: MetaRecipes
feature.description: Ingredients may be another recipe (e.g. recipe for a three course meal has recipes entree, main and dessert as ingredients)

feature.name: AmountsAndUnits
feature.description: Ingredients are assigned ingredient amounts and units

feature.name: Tags
feature.description: Recipes can be tagged, e.g. by cusine

feature.name: Servings
feature.description: Recipes can be annotated with the amount of people the are meant for

and.name: RecipeCLI
and.description: Command for interacting with a single recipe

or.name: EditRecipeUI
or.description: A ncurses-like UI for editing recipes

feature.name: EditRecipe
feature.description: Command to edit an existing recipe

feature.name: DeleteRecipe
feature.description: Command to delete an existing recipe

feature.name: ShopRecipe
feature.description:
Command to add recipe ingredients to an online shopping list which uses the ShoppingList API
(see https://github.com/tstehr/shoppinglist/blob/master/API.md)

feature.name: ScaleRecipe
feature.description: Parameter to scale the recipe for a given number of people

feature.name: MergeRecipe
feature.description: Parameter to merge the ingredients and instructions of any referenced recipes into the display

or.name: TargetRecipeSelection
or.description: Methods to select target recipe of cli command

feature.name: SelectByName
feature.description: Select recipe by fuzzy searching the recipe name

feature.name: SelectByLastListIndex
feature.description: Select by and index of the last shown recipe list

feature.name: SelectByFilterExpression
feature.description: Select recipes by providing a filter expression

or.name: FilterMethods
or.description: Predicates by which recipes can be filtered

feature.name: FilterBooleanExpresion
feature.description: Filters can be boolean expressions combining the base filters
